m_szDocTitle: Musk Talks Model 3, Competition From Apple & Google (Video)
m_szDocSumamry: Musk Talks Model 3, Competition From Apple & Google (Video) Originally published on EV Annex . By Matt Pressman This week, Tesla Motors CEO Elon Musk took the stage at the Code Conference in Rancho Palos Verde, CA. In a fascinating interview with Kara Swisher and Walt Mossberg, Musk answered a wide range of questions and revealed some intriguing insights into the Tesla Model 3 and its aggressive production ramp. In addition, he provided his thoughts on possible competition from Google or Apple to get into the electric vehicle and/or autonomous driving space. And there’s more — Musk made some s
